timeline.bodyText: is that because FieldValueType.STRING is static value, so you intend to comparing values by mem address value?

replies.bodyText: Both work actually. But equals will just go and do == anyway so updates. Also, == will be null safe.

replies.bodyText:
I guess I can. Just wanted to keep a method showing the non-stream way but thought that would be inconsistent. So kept all the sample files using forEach.
I don't have a strong preference, what do you think, update all of them?

replies.bodyText: Personally I like to using stream() if possible.

timeline.bodyText: what is the purpose of using try() but without catch()?
timeline.author: mssfang

replies.bodyText: This is an auto closeable try block. This will make sure the stream is closed out of the block.
